content: this is a fun and fast crochet hat pattern with a candy corn vibe perfect for fall note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own hat > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern the finished hat is approximately 20 around by 8 5 tall materials needed worsted weight yarn crochet hook size h 5/5 0 mm tapestry needle & scissors pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-candy-corn-hat/
